Class SBStatisticsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller.SBStatisticsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SBWebsitesAndMessages

    @Controller
public class SBStatisticsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SBWebsitesAndMessages
    Version:
    2.0

    User: jstachera

    Date: 02.01.2018

    Controller class with methods that support '/statistics/**' links directly.

    Author:
    Justyna Stachera.

        Parameters:
        userDao - It provides methods related with 'sbuser' table from database.
        expenseDao - It provides methods related with 'sbexpense' table from database.
        loanDao - It provides methods related with 'sbloan' table from database.
        taxDao - It provides methods related with 'sbtax' table from database.
